doctors.name: Dr. Aisha Patel
doctors.bio: Dr. Patel is a board-certified cardiologist with over 15 years of experience in treating heart conditions. She is a fellow of the American College of Cardiology.

doctors.name: Dr. Ben Carter
doctors.bio: Dr. Carter specializes in both medical and cosmetic dermatology. He is known for his patient-centric approach and innovative treatment methods.

doctors.name: Dr. Chloe Davis
doctors.bio: With a passion for children's health, Dr. Davis provides comprehensive care for infants, children, and adolescents. She has a friendly and reassuring demeanor.

doctors.name: Dr. David Rodriguez
doctors.bio: Dr. Rodriguez is a leading expert in sports medicine and joint replacement surgery. He is committed to helping patients regain mobility and live pain-free.

doctors.name: Dr. Emily Nguyen
doctors.bio: Dr. Nguyen specializes in treating neurological disorders such as migraines, epilepsy, and Parkinson's disease. She is known for her empathetic care and precision.

doctors.name: Dr. Faisal Khan
doctors.bio: With over a decade of experience in internal medicine, Dr. Khan provides preventive care and treatment for chronic illnesses with a holistic approach.

doctors.name: Dr. Grace Lee
doctors.bio: Dr. Lee is a trusted gynecologist offering a range of women's health services including prenatal care, fertility counseling, and menopause management.

doctors.name: Dr. Harish Mehta
doctors.bio: Dr. Mehta is a renowned oncologist with expertise in chemotherapy and immunotherapy. He advocates for early cancer detection and personalized treatment plans.

doctors.name: Dr. Isabella Russo
doctors.bio: Dr. Russo treats ear, nose, and throat conditions with both medical and surgical solutions. She is especially skilled in pediatric ENT care.

doctors.name: Dr. Jason Wang
doctors.bio: Dr. Wang provides compassionate mental health support for conditions like anxiety, depression, and PTSD. He incorporates therapy and medication management.
